name: Elephant Trivia
blurb: Built with HTML, CSS and jQuery, Elephant Trivia tests your knowledge about Elephants.

name: Where Would Silvia Go
blurb: a Ruby on Rails application inspired by my friend Silvia, who always knows a great place to dine.

name: WiFinder
blurb: An application to help users locate public WiFi in Washington, D.C. Created using Ruby on Rails, WiFinder was a collaborative project between Web Development and UX students at General Assembly.
